ModMetaData.name: VFE - Pirates - TBH Creature
ModMetaData.author: Neko Boi Nick, Dr. Graevik
ModMetaData.description:
Patches Vanilla Factions Expanded with the sound effect commonly used alongside the TBH creature.
Sound effect obtained from Dr. Graevik's Youtube video [Yippee!!!]
Audio also from a very Enthusiastic german kid happy about drinking cola and playing Fortnite at the same time.
All credit goes to them, and please check out their meme!
Thank you!
Dr. Graevik's Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCV3MRQ9OASNXNtO2iTpJLnA Yippee!! Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aU2RhgYLPdo
